text: <@U04T7A5A0KX> Do you have any reference or sample code  pulling a deal data from a associated company with a labeled for example "Partner Company" not on primary company sir ?

Are you working in a sandbox portal? Try the same code in the relative production portal, it should work as expected there. This happened to me as well and I still don't know why it would work in the production portal but not in the sandbox.
PS: if it doesn't work, try using `contact_without_defaults` in place of `contact` .
that seems like a missed opportunity. Why have a module css and not be able to use it because it doesn't support Hubl
